short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks each page for Signed-Exchange (SXG) validation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Signed Exchange (SXG) Validator Chrome Extension that given a URL, determines if it's a valid SXG and if so, the status of its corresponding SXG cache and certificate entry.

When on a page that supports SXG, click the extension icon to view the report.
